channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sofa flytipped in the carpark behind 3 grenadier close, abbeymead, GL4 5GX, 1st February
item.description:
Sofa has been flytipped here over the last day or so. It has not been dumped by any of the house owners in the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Discovery Road, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gutter drains, 1st February
item.description:
Two gutter drains on southside of A40, either side of ingress to Woodgate Close, Charlton Kings, GL52 6UW, choked full with silt causing vehicles to splash pedestrians. Gulley machine required to clear them, please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Woodgate Close, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 1st February
item.description:
New potholes formed in turn right box at BP garage on A40, and just east of same with 2 holes forming next to previously repaired site north side of bollarded crossing point next to Detmore Close..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): London Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 or 3 potholes in middle of road, 1st February
item.description:
2 or 3 potholes here in middle of road directly opp junction, quite deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Carlton Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole on Orchard Way near Russet Road., 1st February
item.description:
Huge pot hole.. causing damage to tyres.. there’s more potholes on Orchard way between Russet Road and the Umbrella pub.. even the speed bumps have pot holes!! Also fills with rain water and when a car drives over it, it’s kicking massive amount of stones on to the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58 Orchard Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes, 1st February
item.description:
Two potholes on junction of The Bank & Mill Street Prestbury. Poor original repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coulter Cottage Mill Street, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many thanks for streetlamp, 1st February
item.description:
Just to say thank you for responding quickly to my report of a leaning lamppost, & its replacement, much appreciated
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Campden Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Bed frame & mattress, 1st February
item.description:
Flytipped bed on central grass verge on Benhall Ave opposite shops
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 40 Benhall Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three very deep large potholes in Hartley Lane about 100 yards or so from junction with A 435/6 roundabout at Seven Springs,,, 1st February
item.description:
These potholes are very very deep and need urgent attention. They are growing week by week. They are all quite close together.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hartley Lane, Seven Springs
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two wide potholes in middle area of Andover Street, Cheltenham, 1st February
item.description:
These pothole have been growing in size over the past month, so that they now need attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Andover Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 31st January
item.description:
One exceptionally large and now deep pothole and one smaller, soon to be bigger one, in the middle of the road . These are noisy abd the roads is used by so much traffic, mostly commercial large vehicles in lockdown. Please fix before it becomes dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 31st January
item.description:
Dangerous. Please fix

Please fix

item.description:
Pot hole must be at least 2" deep and right on centre line of road

item.title: Huge pothole, over 3 feet wide and maybe 5 inches deep. Completely knackered my tyre., 30th January
item.description:
This pothole has been here for at least 6 weeks. It’s on Birdlip hill and has been growing rapidly. The postcode of the stretch of road is GL3 4SL. It is about 100 meters before the two houses that sit just after the forested area shown on the map.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole, sunken ground from previous excavation . BAD, 29th January
item.description:
Extreamly bad pot hole/ road defect !!! People go round and going to cause an issue Needs action as been a long time
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Newdawn Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large sunken section of road extreamly deep, 29th January
item.description:
Sunken section of road , extreamly deep and vehicles go round it to avoid big suspension bangs ,this causes a danger and risk to other road users as right on a roundabout. Extreamly dangourous for motor vehicles and 2 wheeled vehicles . Clearly this section of road not been inspected for a considerable amount of time . 20 jan 2021
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 77 Village Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in v bad condition, 29th January
item.description:
Hello - I was cyling along this road and had to keep swerving to avoid v bad road surface. cars coming the other way were doing the same thing so it had become dangerous and it will only get worse as the new school build progresses. Please could this road be looked at before an accident happens? many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Lantern Lodge Farm Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
